text.autoconfig.quickcoordscopy.title: Quick Coordinates Copy
text.autoconfig.quickcoordscopy.option.c:
Valid variables are: §a$x§r, §a$y§r, §a$z§r, §a$yaw§r, §a$pitch§r, §a$xFull§r, §a$yFull§r, §a$zFull§r, §a$yawFull§r, §a$pitchFull§r, §a$yawSnap§r, §a$pitchSnap.
§aFull§r will round the coordinate to two decimal places.
§a$yawSnap§r will round the yaw to the nearest cardinal direction.
§a$pitchSnap§r will round the pitch to the nearest vertical direction.
